title: No honour progress

embed.description: Grab seriously instant screenshots, screen GIFs, and webpage captures. Get the free app for Windows or Mac to streamline your visual sharing and bookmarking today.

body:
Okay, I'm tired of waiting so I'm going to see if this is a bug or if it's working as intended.

I've been playing since the start of season, and I receive a few key fragments a day reminding me of how many honours I've racked up and given away. Despite this, I've been stuck on level 2 checkpoint 2 since the start of season. I know that in the majority of my games, win or lose, I tend to receive honours from other people, and on most occassions multiple honours, and I almost always give out honours to people other than my duo. I've played a bunch, hundreds of games this season, so I've definitely racked up hundreds of honours from others, and given out many as well, yet I'm still stuck and I don't know why.

Is this a bug, or am I being held back for some reason I'm unaware of?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Tesserax,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=EVqinJcN,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-03-22T07:41:21.406+0000)
>
> Okay, I&#039;m tired of waiting so I&#039;m going to see if this is a bug or if it&#039;s working as intended.
> 
> I&#039;ve been playing since the start of season, and I receive a few key fragments a day reminding me of how many honours I&#039;ve racked up and given away. Despite this, I&#039;ve been stuck on level 2 checkpoint 2 since the start of season. I know that in the majority of my games, win or lose, I tend to receive honours from other people, and on most occassions multiple honours, and I almost always give out honours to people other than my duo. I&#039;ve played a bunch, hundreds of games this season, so I&#039;ve definitely racked up hundreds of honours from others, and given out many as well, yet I&#039;m still stuck and I don&#039;t know why.
> 
> Is this a bug, or am I being held back for some reason I&#039;m unaware of?

So I read through your issue and I had suspicions that it might've been because you were dishonorable. However, I looked at the screenshot and I don't see anything of the sort. This [honor faq](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148-Honor-FAQ) does go through what honor is, how to earn it, and how you lose it. I would take a look at that and see if this answers your questions. My guess is that it's slower to gain honor since the season is still new or you may have had a punishment this season and you're earning your honor again.
